page.title: 16THE VICAR
page.content: {Reverend Wilkinson}is the{vicar}of All Saint's Church Gobowen, he used to be a bank clerk. Sometimes he visits the nearby Orthopaedic Hospital and Derwen Training Centre. He has two hobbies that are gardening and building model railways. He used to live in Bradford before he moved to Gobowen. In a year he carries out about six or eight weddings and fifteen christenings. {All Saint's Church}belongs to the Parish called Hengoed with Gobowen. There are three other churches, the Methodist, Roman Catholic and United Reform Church at Preshenlle. All Saint's is fifty seven years old and was set on fire in 1980 and has since been rebuilt.{Hengoed Church}was knocked down last year due to poor attendances and lack of funds for repairs.
